instructions.name: register_project
docs: Registers a new project on the blockchain (Universal)
- Valid ICM Registry ID (mandatory, must equal project_id)
- Verification fee (minimum 0.1 SOL, held in escrow)

docs: Rejects a project (consuming fee for validation effort)

docs: Retires carbon credits by transferring them to a burn account

docs: Trade credits (placeholder for internal trading logic)

instructions.name: transfer_credits
docs: Transfers carbon credits from one token account to another

instructions.name: verify_project
docs: Verifies a project, allowing it to mint carbon credits
